lines.text:
[singing in Asian accent]
If you have lovely hair, you may want a comb in there. Painted bright, mother-of-pearl, just the thing for a lovely girl.

[seeing the poisoned comb in a mirror]
I've seen that comb somewhere before!

[as she shoves the comb into Snow White's hair, which sends her into a deep sleep]
But you'll *never* see it again!
I shall spend the rest of my life in mourning for her.
This time I'll take care of her myself!
But she looked nothing like the last time.
